extendedInfo.description: ******ATTENTION******Adjust the âTOUCH SENSITIVITYâ if you feel the flick is too weak or too strong.âRollerâ is a Skee-Ball style game. The classic arcade game is on your Android device now!Swipe your finger to roll the ball into different holes with designated points. High res 3d graphics and quality physics will make the ball move, roll and bounce with great realism. This game is easy to play and fall in love with. Youâll feel right back to your childhood.3 different skins for the machine. 6 different balls. You can choose the one you like in "Customize" menu.Tips:Aim is achieved by carefully controlling the start and stop points of the flick, the direction and speed between them.You can also add spin after the ball is released by tilting.Buy the full version to remove ads

reviews.title: Better Apps Out there
reviews.comment: There\'re better apps for free on android and they include prizes/tickets which make it more fun to play!

reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: One of my favorites
reviews.comment: This game is one I keep coming back too after I get bored of others. The simplicity of skee ball and positive memories make this a fun time waster. The controls are tight and responsive, however can get difficult to get REAL power behind a roll, even with touch sensitivity all the way up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Used to love it
reviews.comment: I love the app, it\'s so fun but the freakn app won\'t open half the time and it freezes up. Fix it please!!!

reviews.title: This game SUCKS!!!!
reviews.comment: I downloaded this game 2 days ago & I haven\'t been able 2 play since I downloaded... Everytime I try 2 open the app all it does is goes 2 a black screen & freezes... I had if on my Samsung transform & it worked perfectly but on my HTC it won\'t do crap, what a bummer really enjoyed playing on my old phn... Please fix this problem!!!

reviews.title: It works!
reviews.comment: I tried this a few months ago, and it was force-closing at the start of the round.  Now it\'s OK!  I had to adjust the sensitivity about halfway up, and the controls are good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Freezes Every Time
reviews.comment: Every time I open the app it freezes and has to force close. It\'s rare to even get the home screen to load. If I can get a game to even start it freezes mid roll first roll. Definitely uninstalling.
reviews.author: Shaina Hollins

reviews.title: How to hit 100
reviews.comment: Say you\'re aiming for the 100 to the left, start at the far right and aim for the far left corner, to the LEFT of the cup - full speed. When the ball disappears behind the net, tilt slightly and quickly to the right.
